Module org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core
Package org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core

Interface Case.SimpleCase

All Superinterfaces:
Case, Expression, PropertyAccessor, ProvidesAffixes, Visitable
Enclosing interface:
Case
@API(status=STABLE, since="1.0") public static interface Case.SimpleCase extends Case
Extension the Case interface to support simple case with an initial expression / condition.
